channel.title: Github Pages on Edwardcher Monreal
channel.description: Recent content in Github Pages on Edwardcher Monreal

item.title: Hello
item.description: Restarting my blog on GitHub Pages. I like the fact that everything is in markdown and I can use my favourite text editor(s) i.e. vim or emacs to create content. My content at typepad has stagnated largely due to my working environment. I am using Hugo and Markdown for my new blogging backend because it is more suited to my day to day workflow. Everybody that understands me know I prefer to live in the console/terminal :)
